venue.name: Welch Dickey Loop Trail Parking Lot

item.description:
As a prep hike, would people be interested in doing an early May hike up Mount Dickey in the Waterville valley. This is doable as a day hike from Providence. In the past this has been a 3-4 hour hike. There is good elevation, nice views and it is reasonably short distance.
http://www.fs.fed.us/...

Parking is bad at the trail head so we'd need to car pool at least from the Campton ranger station after picking up parking permits.

I'd suggest we car pool for this meet up. Let's meet at the Stop and Shop at the Branch Ave exit off 95N at 7am to start the drive to the hike. We will then meet at the ranger station off 93 North Campton exit.

A trail map and driving directions are available at this site:
http://www.hikeneweng...

Ian.
item.how_to_find_us: Look for the Blue Trailblazer and a guy with long hair.
item.name: Welch/ Dickey Trail- Waterville valley
